pages.privacy-policy: Lustrify Privacy Policy - Protecting Your Personal Information Lustrify Home Services Why are we Transform space Our collection +91-771-4333333 Privacy Policy Welcome to Lustrify, your one-stop-shop for all things chandeliers. We are committed to providing our customers with the best possible shopping experience, and we take great pride in the quality and craftsmanship of our products. However, before you make a purchase from our site, we ask that you take a moment to read the following disclaimer. First and foremost, it is important to note that all of our chandeliers are intended for indoor use only, unless otherwise specified. They should not be exposed to outdoor elements such as rain, snow, or extreme temperatures, as this can cause damage to the product and potentially pose a safety hazard. Additionally, it is crucial that all chandeliers are installed by a qualified electrician. Improper installation can lead to electrical issues, fire hazards, and other safety concerns. Lustrify is not responsible for any damages or injuries that may occur as a result of improper installation. When it comes to the care and maintenance of your chandelier, it is important to handle it with care. Avoid using harsh chemicals or abrasive materials when cleaning, as this can damage the finish and overall appearance of the product. We recommend using a soft, dry cloth to gently dust the chandelier on a regular basis. It is also important to note that while we strive to accurately represent the color, size, and overall appearance of our chandeliers on our site, there may be slight variations due to factors such as lighting and monitor settings. If you have any concerns about the accuracy of a product's representation, please do not hesitate to contact us for additional information. At Lustrify, we take great care in packaging and shipping our products to ensure that they arrive to you in perfect condition. However, in the event that your chandelier arrives damaged, please contact us immediately so that we can assist you in resolving the issue. We ask that you inspect the package upon delivery and notify us of any damages within 48 hours of receipt. Please be aware that Lustrify is not responsible for any damages or injuries that may occur as a result of misuse or improper handling of our products. This includes, but is not limited to, using the chandelier in a manner that is not intended, hanging items from the chandelier, or attempting to repair or modify the product without proper knowledge and experience. Chandeliers have been a symbol of luxury and elegance for centuries, and at Lustrify, we are proud to continue this tradition by offering a wide selection of high-quality chandeliers to suit any style or taste. From classic crystal chandeliers to modern, minimalist designs, we have something for everyone. Crystal chandeliers have long been a popular choice for those looking to add a touch of glamour and sophistication to their home. The intricate, sparkling crystals create a beautiful, shimmering light that can instantly elevate any space. At Lustrify, we offer a wide range of crystal chandeliers in various sizes and styles, from traditional to contemporary. Whether you're looking for a grand, statement piece for your dining room or a more understated fixture for your bedroom, we have the perfect crystal chandelier for you. If you prefer a more modern aesthetic, we also offer a selection of sleek, minimalist chandeliers. These fixtures feature clean lines and simple shapes, making them the perfect choice for those who prefer a more understated, contemporary look. Our modern chandeliers are available in a variety of materials, including metal, glass, and wood, so you can choose the perfect one to complement your existing decor. In addition to our crystal and modern chandeliers, we also offer a range of other styles, including rustic, industrial, and transitional. Our rustic chandeliers feature natural materials such as wood and iron, and are perfect for creating a warm, cozy atmosphere in your home. Our industrial chandeliers feature exposed bulbs and metal finishes, and are ideal for those who want to add a touch of edgy, urban style to their space. And our transitional chandeliers blend traditional and contemporary elements, making them a versatile choice for any home. At Lustrify, we understand that choosing the right chandelier can be a daunting task. That's why we offer a range of helpful resources to assist you in making the best decision for your home. Our buying guides provide detailed information on the different types of chandeliers available, as well as tips on how to choose the right size and style for your space. And our team of experts is always available to answer any questions you may have and provide personalized recommendations. In addition to our wide selection of chandeliers, we also offer a range of other lighting fixtures, including pendant lights, wall sconces, and floor lamps. Whether you're looking to create a cohesive lighting scheme throughout your home or simply want to add a touch of ambiance to a specific room, we have the perfect solution for you. When it comes to choosing a chandelier, there are several factors to consider. First and foremost, you'll want to think about the size of the room where the chandelier will be installed. A chandelier that is too small will get lost in a large space, while one that is too large will overpower a smaller room. As a general rule of thumb, you'll want to choose a chandelier that is approximately one foot in diameter for every 100 square feet of room space. By making a purchase from Lustrify, you acknowledge that you have read and understand this disclaimer and agree to use our products in a safe and responsible manner. If you have any questions or concerns about this disclaimer or any of our products, please do not hesitate to contact us at lustrify@gmail.com. Thank you for choosing Lustrify for all of your chandelier needs. We are confident that you will be thrilled with the quality and beauty of our products, and we look forward to serving you in the future. Sincerely, The Lustrify Team Lustrify Useful links Home Services Why are we Transform space Our collection Contacts Fafadih, Chowk, Jail Rd, near Guru Gobind Singh Square, Devendra Nagar, Raipur, Chhattisgarh 492001, India +91-771-4333333 lustrify@gmail.com Privacy Policy Terms of Use
pages.services: Lustrify Services - Expert Lighting Design, Installation, and Maintenance Lustrify Home Services Why are we Transform space Our collection +91-771-4333333 Expert Lighting Services for Your Space At Lustrify, we offer a range of expert lighting services to help you create the perfect ambiance in your space. Whether you're looking to install a new lustre, repair an existing one, or design a custom lighting solution, our team of experienced professionals is here to help. With years of experience in the lighting industry, we have the knowledge and expertise to provide you with the highest quality services and solutions. Our services include lighting design and consultation, installation, maintenance, and repair. We work with a wide range of clients, from homeowners and interior designers to architects and commercial property owners, to provide customized lighting solutions that meet their specific needs and preferences. Our team of experts will work with you every step of the way, from the initial consultation to the final installation, to ensure that your lighting project is completed to your satisfaction. We pride ourselves on our commitment to quality, attention to detail, and exceptional customer service. We use only the highest quality materials and products to ensure that your lighting solution is both beautiful and durable. Whether you're looking to create a cozy and intimate atmosphere or a grand and opulent ambiance, our team of experts will work with you to bring your vision to life. Our Services Comprehensive Lighting Solutions for Your Space Lighting Design and Consultation Our team of experts will work with you to design a custom lighting solution that meets your specific needs and preferences, taking into account factors such as the size and layout of your space, your desired ambiance, and your budget. Installation Services We offer professional installation services to ensure that your lustre is safely and securely installed in your space. Our team will handle all aspects of the installation process, from wiring to mounting, to ensure that your lustre is properly installed and functioning. Maintenance and Repair We offer maintenance and repair services to keep your lustre looking and functioning its best for years to come. Our team can provide routine maintenance, such as cleaning and bulb replacement, as well as more extensive repairs, such as rewiring and restoration. Our Process A Seamless and Stress-Free Lighting Experience At Lustrify, we believe that the process of designing and installing a new lighting solution should be seamless and stress-free. That's why we've developed a streamlined process that ensures your project is completed on time, on budget, and to your complete satisfaction. Here's how it works: Consultation We'll start with a consultation to discuss your specific needs and preferences, as well as any challenges or constraints that may impact the design and installation of your lighting solution. Design and Planning Based on your input, our team will create a custom lighting design and plan, taking into account factors such as the size and layout of your space, your desired ambiance, and your budget. Installation Our team will handle all aspects of the installation process, from wiring to mounting, to ensure that your lustre is properly installed and functioning. Maintenance and Repair We offer routine maintenance and repair services to keep your lustre looking and functioning its best for years to come. Customer Satisfaction Your satisfaction is our top priority. We'll work with you every step of the way to ensure that your lighting project is completed to your complete satisfaction. Custom Design We offer custom design services to help you create a unique and personalized lighting solution that reflects your style and enhances your space. Energy Efficiency Our lighting solutions are designed to be energy-efficient, helping you save money on your energy bills while reducing your carbon footprint. Quality Assurance We use only the highest quality materials and products to ensure that your lighting solution is both beautiful and durable, and we stand behind our work with a quality assurance guarantee. Expert Team Our team of experienced lighting professionals has the knowledge and expertise to provide you with the highest quality services and solutions, from design and installation to maintenance and repair. pages.terms-conditions: Lustrify Terms of Use - Guidelines for Using Our Website and Services Lustrify Home Services Why are we Transform space Our collection +91-771-4333333 Terms of Use Use of the Site Lustrify allows you to view various types of chandeliers, including but not limited to crystal chandeliers, modern chandeliers, antique chandeliers, and mini chandeliers. You may use our site only for lawful purposes. Intellectual Property All content on the site, including but not limited to designs, text, graphics, pictures, video, information, software, music, sound, and other files, is the proprietary property of Lustrify with all rights reserved. No part of the site may be reproduced, distributed, or transmitted in any form or by any means, including photocopying, recording, or other electronic or mechanical methods, without the prior written permission of Lustrify. Product Descriptions We strive to be as accurate as possible in our product descriptions. However, we do not warrant that product descriptions or other content of this site is accurate, complete, reliable, current, or error-free. Pricing Prices for our products are subject to change without notice. We reserve the right to change or update prices for any products offered on the site at any time. Order Acceptance Please note that there may be certain orders that we are unable to accept and must cancel. We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to refuse or cancel any order for any reason. Risk of Loss All items purchased from Lustrify are made pursuant to a shipment contract. This means that the risk of loss and title for such items pass to you upon our delivery to the carrier. Warranty Disclaimer Lustrify does not make any warranties about the products offered on the site. The products are provided “as is” and “as available.” Limitation of Liability In no event will Lustrify be liable for any damages, including without limitation, direct, indirect, special, incidental, or consequential damages, losses or expenses arising in connection with our site, services or products. Changes to Terms of Use We reserve the right to update or change our Terms of Use at any time. Your continued use of the site after we post any modifications to the Terms of Use on this page will constitute your acknowledgment of the modifications and your consent to abide and be bound by the modified Terms of Use. Product Availability All products listed on Lustrify are subject to availability. We strive to maintain accurate stock levels on our site, but from time to time, certain products may become unavailable. If a product you have ordered is not available, we will notify you as soon as possible and offer a refund or a replacement product of equal or greater value. Payment Methods We accept various payment methods, including credit cards, debit cards, and PayPal. All payments are processed securely through our payment gateway. We do not store any payment information on our servers. Shipping and Delivery We ship our products worldwide. Shipping fees and delivery times will vary depending on your location and the size and weight of your order. You will be provided with an estimated delivery time at checkout. Please note that delivery times may be affected by unforeseen circumstances, such as inclement weather or delays by our shipping partners. Returns and Refunds We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase from Lustrify. If you are not satisfied with your order for any reason, you may return it within 30 days of receipt for a full refund or exchange. The product must be in its original condition and packaging, and you will be responsible for the cost of return shipping. User Conduct You agree not to use the site in any way that is unlawful, harmful, or infringes the rights of others. You may not use the site to transmit any material that is threatening, defamatory, obscene, or otherwise objectionable. Indemnification You agree to indemnify and hold Lustrify and its affiliates, directors, officers, employees, and agents harmless from any claims, damages, or expenses arising out of your use of the site or your violation of these Terms of Use. Entire Agreement These Terms of Use constitute the entire agreement between you and Lustrify regarding the use of the site, superseding any prior agreements or understandings.
